title: Patch Notes
content: r summon Scratch in the epilogue using Find Familiar. This was preventing you from interacting with him. In the epilogue, Minsc should now account for the edgecase of Happy not being there. Fixed Scratch's spawn point in the Elfsong Tavern camp. If you fail a pickpocket attempt at High Hall, your allies will no longer become hostile towards you. We reminded them that the fate of the world lies in the balance and that you play a pretty big part in it, thief or not. Fixed Gortash's title potential
